traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.

actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is also {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Sword Talons
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
